and optimization, big data systems Academic Area Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering Personal Website (CUHK-Shenzhen) https://myweb.cuhk.edu.cn/yichen Email yichen@cuhk.edu.cn Biography Dr. Yi Chen received her B.Eng. degree from Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications in 2007, majoring in Electronics and Information Engineering. She received her Ph.D. degree in Information Engineering from The Chinese University of Hong Kong (CUHK) in 2012. From 2012 to 2015, she worked as a postdoctoral fellow in the department of Electronic Engineering of City University of Hong Kong. Since March 2015, she has been with the department of Information Engineering, CUHK, as a Research Associate. She has joined the School of Science and Engineering, CUHK Shenzhen in August 2016. Her research interests include wireless communications with the focus on power control and media access control, resource allocation and optimization, scheduling and routing algorithms in data center networks, and Big Data systems.
